org.purewidgets.client.feedback
Interface InputFeedbackListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
PdButton, PdCheckin, PdDownload, PdListBox, PdTagCloud, PdTextBox, PdUpload, PdWidget
public interface InputFeedbackListener

The InputFeedbackListener defines methods associated with the life-cycle of a user input feedback panel.

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso

Method Summary
 void inputFeedbackEnded(InputFeedback<? extends PdWidget> feedback, boolean noMore)
          Triggered when the feedback is removed from the public display.
 void inputFeedbackStarted(InputFeedback<? extends PdWidget> feedback)
          Triggered when the feedback is shown on the public display.
 

Method Detail

inputFeedbackStarted

void inputFeedbackStarted(InputFeedback<? extends PdWidget> feedback)
Triggered when the feedback is shown on the public display.

Parameters:
feedback - The feedback that has been displayed.

inputFeedbackEnded

void inputFeedbackEnded(InputFeedback<? extends PdWidget> feedback,
                        boolean noMore)
Triggered when the feedback is removed from the public display.

Parameters:
feedback - The feedback that has been removed.
noMore - If true, indicated that there is currently no more feedback for this widget; if false, indicates that thre is additional feedback to display.
